FILE: cm670680v11.0.txt
DYAD: SAUDI ARABIA - YEMEN PEOPLES REPUBLIC(S.)
RIVALRY: RIV1273
DISPUTE(S): MID1110 
RIVALRY: RIV2018
DISPUTE(S): MID3054 

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180317
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180317

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1110

TERRMID: MID1110 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID1110 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID1110 from cm narrative and Gibler 2018, Saudi Arabia and South Yemen were disputing their border and clashed in 1969. Coded territorial MID because this was connected to a territorial dispute. 

TERRLINK: MID1110 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1110 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID-CER: MID1110 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES:

ISLMID-CER: MID1110 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES:

MID3054

TERRMID: MID3054 1 -- territorial MID
TERRMID-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID30054 from cm narrative and Gibler 2018, Saudi Arabia and South Yemen were disputing their border. In 1983-1984, Saudi Arabia and South Yemen clashed over a border post. Coded territorial MID becaUse this was connected to a territorial dispute. 

TERRLINK: MID3054 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES:

ISLMID-NOTES:

CIVWARMID-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3054 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES:

COUPLINK-CER: MID3054 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 
RIV2018: MID3.02 corrects MID3054 (1984) by changing N. Yemen to S. Yemen.

NARRATIVE-CM:
Saudi Arabia and South Yemen disputed their border after South Yemen formally achieved independence from Britain on November 30, 1967. Saudi Arabia refused to recognize the government of South Yemen. Saudi Arabian troops and South Yemen troops clashed near the border from November 26 to December 5, 1969. Saudi Arabia and South Yemen established diplomatic relations on March 9, 1976.

SOURCES-CM: 
*Keesing*, May 7, 1976; *Middle East Journal *(MEJ), Spring 1970.

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
